attributes.action: Bring Back National Service for Teenagers and Immigrants...
attributes.additional_details:
I think it would be good to have some sort of National Service for people that are born here and for people that want to live here.
It does not have to be in the armed forces but it should be in service of Our Country and it could be things like - Cleaning up areas in regards to the environment, helping out at events, digging ditches for drainage.
The list of tasks could be endless and it could run for say 6 months and the end result would be that they have learnt to respect where they live and obey the laws of our land...
